information.title: Newcomer's Guild
information.description: The newcomer's guild was founded to aid the adventurous in beginning their journey.

room.name: Armory
room.text: You enter a large room filled with shelves full of weapons and armor. A large man stands in the middle keeping careful watch over the equipment.

room.name: Inscription Room
room.text: You enter a room lined with shelves containing thick bound tomes. A small elderly elf sits at a small table wielding a quill and parchment.

room.name: Martial Courtyard
room.text: As you step out into the light, you find yourself in an expansive courtyard filled with animated practice dummies. The dummies seem to be capable to basic communication.
